textAfterTable: 13 Songs Biography Born: 08 February 1942 Genre: Salsa and Tropical Years Active: '50s, '60s, '70s, '80s, '90s One of the most influential Cuban musicians of the Castro era, Juan Formell formed Los Van Van in 1969 after developing Afro-Cuban meldings with the changui sound of Elio Reve's Orchestra.
